traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The mezzoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The mezzoloth's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The mezzoloth makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its trident.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d4 + 4 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Trident
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) piercing damage when held with two claws and used to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Teleport
entries: The mezzoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.
